√lip 'smear'

present: [6.] limpáti etc. AV.+  limpáte etc. S.+  

perfect: lilepa  lilipus B.+  

aorist: [1.] alepi   -- [2.] alipat  alipata   -- [3.] alīlipat   -- [4.] alipta  alipsata  

[future: lepsyati  lepsyate  leptā  ]

verbal: litpa AV.+  -lípya B.+  

secondary: passive: lipyate etc. B.+  lipyati   -- intensive: lelip-   -- desiderative: lilipsa-   -- causative: lepayati etc. E.+  limpayati  

derivatives: lepa  lepaka C.  lepin E.+  lepya C.  lepana S.+  lipi E.+  -limpa AV.B.  limpi C1.  lipti C.  

Compare the other root-form, rip.
